pullrequest.title: Model becomes transparent while being manpulated

content.raw:
The tests are build by default. Just in case, make sure to turn the following flag for cmake:

`cmake .. -DENABLE_TESTS_COMPILATION=True`

Running `make test` would run all of the tests in Gazebo, which takes a long time. To run just the `ModelAlign` test for example you can just:

~~~
cd build/gazebo/gui/
./UNIT_ModelAlign_TEST
~~~
content.html:
The tests are build by default. Just in case, make sure to turn the following flag for cmake:

cmake .. -DENABLE_TESTS_COMPILATION=True

Running make test would run all of the tests in Gazebo, which takes a long time. To run just the ModelAlign test for example you can just:

cd build/gazebo/gui/
./UNIT_ModelAlign_TEST
